conbody.p: A validation rule represents the business logic used to validate values of class or dataset attributes after their modification. A rule accepts the business entity as input parameters and a status and list of messages as output parameters. The rule is executed before the business entity is saved.
Only one validation rule can be created for a business entity. This rule covers the attributes that compose the entity. No specific rule is created for a dedicated attribute.
A validation rule is generally called on a pageflow transition and returns a set of messages displayed on a page to provide feedback to the user.
